content: It is the best app for learning coding if you are week in coding and you want to learn coding you can use this app it has many languages like python, C++,java,etc. Now I am learning python its cool to install this app you can build games for console etc. if you want to learn with fun please install this app I truely recommend you this is the best ü§ôapp you have many features in this app like you have leaderboard you have tests and you can earn ex and go up in the leaderboard you have leagues Tq.

Start learning python basics on this app but got stuck at the break and continue lesson because program they give me to solve doesn't solve even after using thier own solution codeüòê Almost 3 weeks are gone and this problem didn't solved.
replyContent:
Hello Numan Hassan,
Thanks for your feedback!

Please update the app to the latest version for an enhanced code learning experience and let us know if the problem persists by providing extra details and a screenshot/video at info@sololearn.com

content: It's for sure got a lot of great tutorials and information for a beginner like me. However, I find it concerning that I, for example, can use the exact same code from the python course and put it into VS Code and not get the same result. Maybe it's something I'm doing wrong but it still bothers me and makes me wonder if I'm getting bad habits right from the start.
replyContent:
Hello Jason,

Thanks for your feedback! We are sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send more detailed information about your programming experience to us at info@sololearn.com so that we can understand your issue better and try to resolve it?

content: Using this to learn python and it does a great job of breaking learning points into bite sized chunks and allowing you to practice some of what you learn. Intuitive and there's comments for each part to get more understanding.

This app is the best im currently learning python at home and i have completed 4 of 9 chapters .. the problem im experiencing is when im doing challenges .. after completing the challenge you are forced to wait for the oppoent to finish answering their questions which wastes a lot of time. Can you please allow both People to answer questions at the same time im sure that will reduce the time we spend after completing the challenges and be able to get our results . Thank you !!!
replyContent:
Hi,
Thanks for your feedback.Your suggestions have been forwarded to the appropriate team for consideration.
We work tirelessly to improve our content, platform, and services by listening to and responding to members of our community.We learn from every piece of feedback we get and we love to hear ways to make Sololearn a better academy for coders.

content: Was going very well but the Ticket prices exercise for while/break/continue in the python course doesn't work even using their solution (as several entries are input at once leading to EOF error) UPDATE: managed to get past there with a Google and using try/except statements. Now hit another faulty exercise where the expected outputs of the BMI calculator code project are incorrect (checked by using a manual calc on the inputs)
replyContent:
Hi, Thanks for your feedback!
We recommend heading to our Discuss Q&A forum for all of your programming-related questions. Our friendly community is always ready to help! For more information get back to us at: info@sololearn.com

Happy Sololearning!

content: The best python learning app ever. Try and see my point.

An excellent app. Positively challenging and very rewarding. Have paid for yearly subscription and will pay for another to keep the momentum going. Have got my python for data science certificate after stopping and starting the course over several months and then pushing myself to stay up all last night to damn well get to the finish line, which I damn well did! I am now going to try and get some sleep before the sun rises. More courses to build upon my progress beckon. Will update..
This app is great for getting a start and for small challenges to help you stay on top of things but youll need to find additional sources to learn more, atleast with python.

Blocked my account with no explanation after I was several lessons in with no explanation no matter how many times I asked their terrible customer service why. Went with their competitors and have been learning python from them. Basically a freemium app. Pretty worthless.
replyContent: Hello, Thanks for your feedback. Could you please send more detailed information to us at info@sololearn.com so that we can understand your issue better and try to resolve it? Have a nice day!

content: End of module python challenges are a great addition. Would greatly benefit from being able to practice questions like those used in challenges without need for an opponent, nor the time limit, if one chooses. To balance, maybe don't award any XP for such sessions.
Excellent app, I've been doing a google course for python and stopped at some point, this app helped me build my confidence and move forward, totally recommend!

I love it! I understand that they need to profit with their app but i love it I can learn python like i am playing a game..tho i only have 3 lives to try answering questions it gives a nice break not to answer for compliance. It really helps the learner to have a sense of commitment to the learning process. I hope that the developers will not be too greedy to put annoying advertisments and put more restrictions or limitations for studying a course in the future.

Meanwhile the base learning courses are very good (I am using python), I have been having trouble with the challenges where even the correct solution isn't right and keeps flagging parts as "incorrect syntax".
replyContent: Hello! Thanks for your feedback! We are sorry for the inconvenience! Please send more detailed information to us at info@sololearn.com so that we can help resolve the issue. Looking forward to hearing from you!

content: My python coding progress is getting better each time
You can easily learn python , html, c++, java etc. Programming hear. I was don't know anything about python but, i am still learning and i can see the results that i did progress in python.

For community it is good but for programming it is very bad only for html css, but it does not support any big or meduim like programs in python and c also you cannot code in more than 10 or 11 language i want to code but this app is not good for coding it is good for community practise message and like social network..... For good programming and if you want to code on projects you can install dcoder and its community is not good like this but dcoder's programming language section is good

Generally a great app in many way but it is slightly let down by a couple of things. Firstly, it seems like they gave up on a few of the modules, most noticeably the OOP module in python. Secondly, the lack of functionality on the web based app means you have to do a lot of the challenges on your phone and typing code on your phone is a pain! Other than that it has been a really excellent and helpful course and I am happy I went pro.

Really this app is amazing when I was installed this app I thought it just something interesting I thought that we can share everything and even I don't have will have any project I will just have to learn python later when I install inferencing and there was so much do I was having community discuss and many more so I love love love this app that's why I want you all too tried out it's really good habit in also have battles over there and they are also we can chat so that we can discuss Install

Very nice app. Learning the basics of python by theory, coding what you learnt and then having challenges and quizzes. I love the way it is built up and the community behind it is very helpful. Also you can use it very well in the free version with only some short ads and few functionalities locked.

This is an updated review. The app has been much improved since I last used it back in 2017. The pro coding exercises for python in the app are great and can be very challenging at times. My only gripe at the moment is that the website doesn't offer the coding exercises found in the app, even if you pay for pro. Also, when using a bluetooth keyboard (or emulating Android in Bluestacks) the keyboard doesn't 100% correctly in the editor. I can type all day, but I still have to touch TAB...
I love using solo learn as it helps me sharpen my skills in python language, the challenges offered are also good. It's a great app.

I enjoy using this app touching on java and getting a on the go experience of learning when I can during my lunch breaks or chilling with my significant other. Also helped me brush on python to study with my friend that wanted to practice.

Awesome app. Lots of various code to learn, easy execution, well formatted, useful online chat forums and comments. And love the feature where you can share code with other users. Could use some more interactive challenges and classes but very pleased, they have coding for all kinds of things, from javascript, C#, python, to machine learning and html. Pleased, also not too many ads and all for free!

I would give u a 5 star but no...i spent more than _20 mins writing python code for the jungle camp challenge to only find that it had an EOF error...i try again for more than 6 times but it fails..i copy the code and paste it on the code playground and then works...but when i return it does not work..dont get me wrong this is a very helpful app and i really like it but this just makes me angry and feel like quit programing which is not supposed to happen

This app is great.The thing they have got to do something to their Code Playground.When using python I cannot import third party modules giving so much limitation on whatever you do with this app.Though to say the truth, the experience was great. I love their coding challenges and their play section for some coding battles. This a great community for any beginner learning to code since I was once their and it was like a year ago. This app is great and I would recommend it to my friends.

Sir please make free the prolearn content and upgrade with new courses like artificial intelligence etc and add challenges for mysql, css, and etc.Add code coach challenges to all courses not only in python

Best python courses ever! Also this app has a social network like Instagram that help programmers know eachother and solve programs together... And you can competition with others programmers! Just install it you will not be disappointed!
This app sucks!! I was learning python and suddenly when I opened this app, all my progress in python learning was gone. I had to start again from the basics.

We are sorry for the inconvenience, it should not be like that.
Please contact us via info@sololearn.com so we can check your account and try to help.

content: It is best way to start. You can learn html, java, python, css, php, and many more language. The content of this app is very awesome and have a large valuable community who are passionate to code. Every chapter have a comment area where you can comment about that. Here a lot of useful comment which fulfill the sololearn content. If you are a beginner you must start with this app. You can follow top coders and also your friends. There is also challenges which improves your knowledge.

Nice, desciptive and easy tutorials to get the basics for a programming language. I only tryed out Java-tutorial jet. Might have more features i did not use jet, like challenges/tasks from the community and content developer. I would recommend this app but i also thinks it is hard for beginners (without any knowledge). Use the app to recap knowledge and play around with different languages (python, java ,...)
Very nice app for learning. I'm using it to learn python and so far it's very helpful. Lots of content with discussions, challenges and possibility to test and play with code.

I wanted to do some plot using matplotlib library but it was showing no output.I was a bit confused and then found that It doesn't support matplotlib,scipy,pygame like python packages.I am very disappointed.üòëüòë

Very intuitive, professional guidance and modular, step-by-step lessons. Features also include multiple choice quizzes, exercise scenarios, many different languages and a social competition ranking. Having a good time, finally learning python!

The best learning experience i ever seen.... The coding challenges are awesome..... Before i see sololearn, my time killer is whatsapp... üòÖüòÖ But now i am fell love with sololearn.. And learn more about python and its modules.... Thanks developers..... Plz tell how i give more stars.....

Great for learning python. Take your time and after you finish the control structures moduel you should refresh the basic concepts by taking the quiz at the end of it and if need be, go throught it again. As you complet each continue to refresh all the ones you have completed with there end quiz and going through those you don't do well on. Doing it like this i am making progress in leaps and bounds. Also look up python projects to do for bigginers.

I recently started learning python on this app and I feel like I'm nicely progressing. The lessons are clear and well explained and the proposed challenges are a great way of learning the logic behind coding. So I recommend this app a 100%

I'm using this app to learn python from zero coding experience. So far it's been great. It breaks down each concept into a simple, easy module and then gives you a quiz. The part that I really like is the experience/level gain. It makes it into a game which makes it fun to keep going. I have not paid for the pro version yet but even so I still feel like I gain a lot

An excellent resource for learning about how programming languages work. I have been using it to learn python, and the ability to write code in a similar environment to what is seen in the python IDE is great. I catch myself using it whenever I get a break, rather than getting on social media. Highly recommended.

Best app to learn programming. Has challenges and best of all a section for users to ask questions and get answers from other users, you can even share your codes. I will rate it 5 stars after studying python there.
well while learning python solo learned challenged me . accepted it and it asked questions that i didn't learned yet . its discouraging.

this app help me lot by this app I able to learn languages such as HTML,c++, python and JavaScript. if you want to learn this languages then I suggest you download this app. this app have many things like lesson, quizzes,challenges and code generator platform by this you can make your own code one bad thing if you want to learn then you have to on your mobile data

Downloaded this to start learning python. Each module explains the content in an ways to understand format, even if you are struggling there is someone in the comments section of each question to break it down.
I am in learning mode of python.it gave a chance to aquire a knowledge.its very intresting than other challenging games because here we can challenge every member(1tolast and all over the world)

the best app for coding. I loved it very much it contains many challenges and questions.I found learning python to be very easy. This app can be much better if they provide a cheatsheet and summary for revision.Eventually it's an awesome experience.

its a fun edu-app with a built in PvP game, and an ai opponent if you dont have friends. I just barely started learning python 3 on udemy and i took a small break, iwanted to use this app as a refresher to hop back in. thing is: this app is great and im strongly considering buyibg the premium version or what ever they call it after i finish my course on python. i have a feeling using this app to learn other languages after already knowing one is a huge help. thank u creators and any one readinüëç
I actually have a python course with Udemy. however this app is fantastic when im out of the house. great for break time at work when i want to keep up to date with my studies. highly recommended
Very good app to learn java, python or sql etc, only thing felt disappointed is that ads distracting during learning

I've been thoroughly enjoying the SoloLearn experience, being able to practice on the go is a great plus - only adding 4 stars as the python tutorial has quite a few flaws, most of which were pointed out by the community 2+ years ago.

I have learned python on SoloLearn. I'll say this app has a very simple and straightforward way of explaining stuffs. Due to the interactive environment and different challenges,the user gets benefits.I guarantee that u'll never be dissatisfied. Waiting for what, c'mon INSTALL it Now !!!!

Very good app that can break it down and make everything easier to understand and memorize. I never thought I would be able to learn coding after failing to memorize all those books... but this app did it... 3 months and now I can code with python!

seems pretty decent so far. had to change apps from the learn python app but it tansferred all my progress and now there's a few more ads but course continues for free so far and there's more stuff, like other languages, to explore later.
A great start point to learn python, from a beginner's perspective.
Very good. I think, the best app to learn java, c++ and python. If you translate competitive mode to russian, I would be happy.
I have to do a state-wide science competition and learn python for a raspberry pi and this is very good. Although I am a genius... it is easy for me but maybe not others

Haven't done much in the app but I can't progress any further as she I do the python tests some answers require multiple things or number with more than one digit to be types in which the answer box does not allow. This is a big bug and makes this app unusable.

Hi,

We'd like to know more information about your issue. Please contact us via info@sololearn.com and we will help.

content: Was using the python coding app, till j was forced to switch to this app, not I can't click the "check" button anymore because the virtual keyboard pops up, I have tried to minimize the keyboard, but it pops back up immediately. 2 stars because they forced me to switch to this app, and it doesn't work.
replyContent:
Hi,

Please be informed that separate apps are going to be discontinued soon. That is why we strongly recommend to use all in-one app which has better user experience and more lessons. For more information, please contact us via info@sololearn.com and we will be happy to help you.

content:
As a 14 yr old student studying c#, this app is amazing for me as it allows 
me to study and practice my skills in c# and python for free outside of 
school and over holidays! The comments are great and the daily challenges 
are fun Imo this is the best learning app ive tried

Definitely useful for get a good foundation in the basics . Need to add 
more courses like data science with python pandas and machine learning in 
subjective and quiz . Quiz is the best part with challenging questions. 
Please add the above courses if possible . Thank you for good application

Very Wonderful, Sololearn is a very nice app that can teach you many 
programming languages in amazing and enjoying manner,learn,see notes, 
practice,see output, accept challenges,do daily goals,take quizes,ask 
doubts and mnay more which is absolutely free.I salute to such app makers. 
Thank you So much for helping me learn C++ and python
Really fun way to learn python via challenges

Good but not excellent. For python, there is not enough examples per 
chapter, and the challenge section doesn't take in consideration what you 
know, the questions are not for beginners, mainly for experts by experts...

Awesome app. This is the best one in town. I was a total noobie in python 
and due to SoloLearn's beginner friendly interface and learner's community 
I'm quite adept at python. And the code challenges are very helpful. Till 
now NO BUGS.
I'm stuck at home with two kids, still this app facilitated me to learn SQL, java, python! Newly added challenge feature makes the learners confident of their actual learning!

An excellent application to learn languages like python, I've been using it and found it handy to learn on the go, even a break of 5 mins in my work schedule means a lot with this application. Great way to learn with code dry runs while trying to solve the problems after every concept.

Right now I'm learning Python and it's been great. It goes at a good pace thats it's not too fast but also not boring (usually it just cuts to the case and tells you what things are). It's really easy to go back to old lessons to review an old concepts which makes it work similar to a Python encyclopidia. The only critisms I have is that the quizes can be pritty useless some timsles since they don't really push you to understand what it said. (Sometimes I don't even know why they would ask the question). Also it is kind of annoying that I can't use the old "Learn Python" app anymore to learn since it just pushes me to use this app, there's no different in how I learn it's just that I prefer to use the app thats just for python (since its more to the point and has less extra stuff).

Don't write reviews normally but just had to for this; It really helps with my python programming and GCSEs the community on here is great and you receive a response to your question in around 15 mins! Amazing!!!! Easy to follow, and competitive on the challenge mode! Brilliant for first time coders and past coders looking to improve. I've NEVER learnt as much coding as I have on this, and it's completely FREE!!!

I've been using it a month and I'm almost through the Python module. It's great. Easy to learn on the go. Community support is brilliant . I replaced one of my habitual game choices with this app and now I'm learning python.... boom!

I've found the app to be great for getting started learning python.  Since I come to this as a beginner, it is great to feed myself as much as I can when I can on my phone.  I fill in time with learning and enjoy going through the examples.  The fact that there is a built-in code editor is great too.  I haven't tried out too much of the social aspect of the app but hope to do so soon.  Well done guys (and gals).

The app in itself I great. Intuitive to use. I did both the python and C++ tutorial, having previous experience in both. The python tutorial was well written with good accurate texts and good questions.  However I don't recommend the C++ course. The writer of the tutorial has not understood pointers, writes inaccurate texts, and bad examples. This course should be reviewed.

Best of the code teaching app. I have installed and feeling very lucky.  It is not less than our course,all included it like comments ,post , modules etc. But the best is that it include challenges,leader board and much more. Explanation of python is best and interactive quizzes. ALSO it's badge idea is fantastic,it is mesmerising application for coding. It includes so many option and also I can ask,answer and do much more in this application.  Thank you so much{heartily} to all makers of this app.  Keep it up!

This app is amazing! It offers the perfect balance between theoretical knowledge and practical application. Best of all, with its challenges and forum, it's kind of addictive! I started out learning python, but soon found myself completing almost all the other courses.
I'm an infrastructure engineer trying to break in to the DevOps world and this app has helped me learn ruby and python on my commute! The questions make the info stick so you don't forget.
Very nice and easy interface. Tutorial lessons (python) are simple and to the point, with questions to demonstrate application. The social aspect is also a perk

So far so good. Started in on the python course and am now around half way through it. Each lesson is nicely separated into specific parts. Not using the social sections much yet, but it looks like a bit of that as well for someone else to write about. Edit: Made it through the python course. ;)

Tried several apps to learn python and c++ then I discovered the sololearn c++ app which was great. Then all the sololearn apps were merged into one which has made it even better because I am.learming the languages I want in an enjoyable way and to top it off I can switch between phone, table and macbook and my progress is kept in sync on all my devices! The best programming language learning app out there for sure

It's the best way to learn python, there are no catches and the app is completely free with no ads. It is very fun and easy to learn python this way, there is also a website for this so you can code with the same account on different devices. There are very helpful forums, fun challenges, learning and the access to play other's games. You can learn to code in many languages as well. This is the best app to exist on the ground google play store! 11/10

Good idea, but.. Code challenges are really stupid. Most of them (c# and python) are not about programming -  its about getting substring from index 13 to 17 (yes, stupid calculating chars by your finger), integer and decimal division, and prefix/postfix increment/decrement. Really? Also challenges are repeated very often. Two days and it became totally boring. Though lessons are pretty good.

Mindblowing. Wow!! Its a great app for people who want to learn python from scratch & that too in a short span of time. U will easily finish one volume in a day if u can devote at most 1 hr every day. The basics r easy, but as u level up, u will take little more time, but that'll be fair. Cheers! Just go for it.

I've been teaching myself python and c++ lately, and I found the structure of sololearn to be very helpful. It has a good interface, simple but progressive excercises, and a great platform for writing, testing, and sharing code in your language of choice.  Highly recommended!
Really very nice app for beginners who want to learn coding in a easy way but in challenging mode only Js and c# are there what about python, php and Java.

It's an excellent app. It's like a combination of all the solo learn apps. Only one thing I request.. Could you please please please add other languages in the challenges section? I am looking at python personally. Right now there's only js and cp. Also, could you add Go Lang in the learning section? It would be awesome
Can you add more challenge s.like python challenge or anu thing else
Please add the option of challenges for java, c#, python...........................Also this app really need a chat...
